! Invalid selector:
namu.wiki##:xpath(//article/h1/following-sibling::div[1]/following-sibling::div//div[count(*)>1][not(ancestor::div[count(*)>1]/ancestor::article)]/div[1])
! Invalid selector:
namu.wiki##:xpath(//div/h1/following-sibling::div[1]/following-sibling::div//div[count(*)>1][not(ancestor::div[count(*)>1]/ancestor::div[./h1])]/div[1])
